document_data.mainbody:
he Judgement of Tyr was the unique enchanted amulet owned by Nayeli Goldflower in the late 15 century DR.
The Judgement of Tyr had engraving of Tyrs holy symbol on its face and the emblem of Daggerford on the inside, that Nayeli Goldflower liked being close to her heart, defending her oaths to the Even-Handed God.
The Judgement of Tyr possessed the ability to envelops its wearer and her allies with the effects similar to that of the aura of purity spell, removing all negative effects, both mundane and of magical nature.
*Nayeli Goldflower a paladin from the city of Daggerford and an adventurer who worked with other warriors of Waterdeep, performing missions on behalf of Laeral Silverhand in the late 15 century DR.
